alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NUECES AND NORTHWESTERN KLEBERG COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bishop, or near Driscoll. This thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Driscoll, Bishop, Kingsville Naval Air Station, and Petronila. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 676 and 694. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
